issue.title: [C++] Nicer PrettyPrint for date32
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4505](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4505). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Current:

```Java

In [3]: pa.array([date(2001, 1, 1), None, date(2001, 1, 2)])                                                                                                                                   
Out[3]: 
<pyarrow.lib.Date32Array object at 0x7f033ce9c458>
[
  11323,
  null,
  11324
]
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4505?focusedCommentId=16834054) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
And the same for TimestampArray:

```Java

In [55]: pa.array([pd.Timestamp("2012-01-01")])                                                                                                               
Out[55]: 
<pyarrow.lib.TimestampArray object at 0x7f27716a12c8>
[
  1325376000000000
]
```

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4505?focusedCommentId=16837052) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4268
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4268>
